title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not being saved and restored between workbench sessions.
OB: The MRU file list is empty when the workbench is restarted.
EB: The MRU file list should be preserved and displayed when the workbench is restarted.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench. 5. Verify that the MRU file list is empty.
